28.eng-name: The Book of Oaths, Muharibin, Qasas (Retaliation), and Diyat (Blood Money)

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Ibn Shihab with the same chain of transmitters but with this addition:" Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) decided (according to Qasama) between the persons of Ansar (and yours) about a slain (Muslim) for which they made claim against the Jews
